document.full_text: at&t inc's $39 billion  (24 billion pounds) bid to buy deutsche telekom ag's t-mobile usa came under scrutiny from new york's attorney general, who said he was looking into whether it was anti-competitive.
document.title: ny ag to review at&t purchase of t-mobile
lines_and_colors: at&t inc's $39 billion  (24 billion pounds) bid to buy deutsche telekom ag's t-mobile usa came under scrutiny from new york's attorney general, who said he was looking into whether it was anti-competitive.
